description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。 本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings. The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2.電力電子元件特性 3.元件與電路佈局4.元件特性與雜訊 5.元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 一.電力設備的故障二.比壓器,比流器三.保護電驛的構造及動作原理四.常用的保護電驛五.發電機與電動機的保護六.變壓器的保護七.線路保護八.異常電壓的預防九.熔絲十.保護協調
description.en: <一>INTRODUCTION<二>WHAT REALLY IS THE MVA METHOD<三>THE ABC OF THE MVA<四>WHY THE MVA METHOD<五>COMPARISON OF THREE METHODS<六>CAN PHASE-GROUND FAULT BE SOLVED <七>MVA METHODS FOR INSTANTANEOUS VOLTAGE ESTIMATE<八>THE SIMPLE COMPUTER TIME SHARE PROGRAM<九>CONCLUSION

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

name.zh: 高科技專利取得與攻防
name.en: High Tech Patent Applications and Protections

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。探討專利相關法規及其應用：專利重要法規，專利實體審查基準，專利案例閱讀與分析，專利舉發 ，專利行政救濟，專利侵權鑑定，專利迴避性設計，簡易專利地圖製作，專利應用範例。
description.en: Discussing the patent laws and its applications, it includes:●A few important patent laws●Guidelines for substantive examination for invention patent●Practices in applying for patents●Practices in patent invalidations●Patent administrative remedy●Theories in patent infringement assessment●Innovative designing around patent●Patent mapsPatent cases study

notes: 修課人數上限60人,機電所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用以發展與分析三維空間多體運動學與動力學的觀念, 定義, 與技巧. 主要課題包括計算動力學簡介, 剛體運動學, 動態方程的構成, 侷限動力學與空間動力學等.
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, definitions, and techniques used for developing and analyzing kinematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics. ematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 1.軟體架構總覽 2.Client-server式架構 3.Model-view-controller式架構 4.n層式架構 5.Peer-to-peer式架構 6.式樣導向式架構 7.Pipes and filter 式架構特論
description.en: 1.Software architecture-overview 2.Client-Server 3.Model-view-controller 4.n-Tier design 5.Peer-to-peer 6.Pattern-oriented software architecture 7.Special Topics:pipes and filter

description.zh: 敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容:工業組織、人事管理、工廠規劃、成本分析與控制、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

notes: 教室科研825上課時間(六)8.9.A節

description.zh: 時序進入Web 2.0時代，網路行銷已不再停留在發e-mail而已了為了破除這個迷思，本課程嘗試從Web 2.0的思維，以「個案」、「實務」二個導向為主要設計，將傳統行銷與新的網路行銷做一整合，從概念、理論、實務、到重要議題詳細闡述網路行銷的各個面貌。並介紹現今網路行銷重點議題，以簡單易懂的觀念與案例，一步步引導進入網路行銷的世界。 本課程探討一對一行銷與網路廣告、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、網路金流機制、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，一對一行銷，行動商務之網路行銷、網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學有網路行銷實務規劃之能力。
description.en: The Internet is becoming an important way to market your products and services. As a business owner, it is essential to understand the benefits of marketing on the Internet and the different options and technologies available. Simply having a web presence is not enough. Creating a website for your company is only the first step.Increasing usage of the Internet reduces traditional media's effectiveness as people give up their time for other activities such as watching TV and reading newspapers or magazines to the Internet.1.Less costly compare to traditional advertising media 2.Increased exposure, no geographic boundary for Internet users3.More personalized ads 4.More targeted audience 5.More accurate as it can be updated timely with minimal effort and cost 6.Easier to collect and track customer information

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1)了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4)將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

notes: 限研二_教室科研723上課時間(三)A.B.C節

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本課程介紹產品介面設計之系統性實務。產品介面設計面臨使用者多樣化與介面日趨複雜的挑戰，設計者必須憑藉精確的方法才能掌握設計的易用性。各種方法包括：使用者需求探討、使用性分析、解決方案評估、實驗模型製作、使用者測試等。其中使用性測試係模擬介面與使用情境，藉由觀察與記錄挖掘操作過程之經驗，其中包括操作錯誤、使用疑惑、使用挫折、使用效率與使用滿意度。本課程將介紹上述各種方法及理論，並以案例引導學習者思考與操作。
description.en: This course is to introduce a practical and systematic way to deliver a product that works for users. It is a methodical approach involves several methods, including gathering requirements, analyzing usability problems, evaluating design alternatives, proposing solutions, developing and testing prototypes, and testing a interface with users. The goal of usability testing is to uncover problems that users may encounter so those problems can be fixed. Testing may include collecting data on the paths users take to do tasks, the errors they make, when and where they are confused or frustrated, how fast they do a task, whether they succeed in doing the task, and how satisfied they are with the experience. Case studies and practice will be carried out with illustration and discussions.

description.zh: 人機境互動設計專題係使用者、產品、環境彼此之間互動作用為主題，思考其介面設計，產品語言和溝通之脈絡。透過理論、案例、實作，驗證產品創新方法。
description.en: Human-Machine-Environment interaction design is a field in which designers discover and respond to people's spoken and unspoken needs through analyzing physical, cognitive, social, and cultural human factors. These factors reveal human needs and activities in an effort to create products, messages, services, and systems that fit people's lifestyles. Human-centered design employs methods including behavioral observation, prototyping, and systems design.

description.zh: 本課程之目的係透過產品之分析，探討設計者、使用者與產品三者間訊息傳達之模式，藉由相關理論之探討與個案研究，培養學生對設計傳達理論之應用與分析方法之能力。
description.en: The aim of this course is via the analyze of product to explore the communicated mode in designer, user and product. By the exploration of related theory and case study, it trains the students the application of design communication and the ability of analytic method.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

name.en: Fire Safety and Smoke Control Technology

description.zh: 先修課程︰流體力學、熱力學本課程主要針對建築物防火及排煙技術作深入探討，主要闡述︰1. 火災動力學2. 防火材料性質3. 排煙技術4. 防火排煙設備5. 防火材料及設備測試6. 建築物防火排煙設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of fire safety and smoke control technology for buildings.The course includes the following topics:1. The outline of the dynamics of a fire2. The property of fire safety materials3. The smoke dynamics and smoke control technology4. The facilities for fire safety and smoke control.5. Testing of materials and facilities for fire safety and smoke control.6. Design of a fire safety and smoke control system for a building.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
description.en: This course introduces principles and techniques of thermal management and cooling design of electronic equipments.  Subjects of this course include: thermal and physical properties of electronic components, thermo-fluid phenomena and principles of thermal management for electronic devices, and the evolution of cooling devices such as heat pipes and micro fans, discussion of analysis methodologies and computer software of thermal management problems including thermal resistances, temperature gradient, and thermal stress.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 1. 電力系統經濟調度2. 傳輸損失3. 機組規劃4. 水火力機組協調5. 發電控制6. 電力系統互聯7. 電力系統安全度8. 狀態評估
description.en: 1. Economic dispatch of power system2. transmission losses3. Unit commitment4. coordination of hydro-thermal generators5. generation control6. inter-connected power systems7. Security of power system8. State estimation

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: RF 系統簡介、RF設計概念、傳輸線分析、史密斯圖、調變與偵測、多工汲取技術、無線傳輸標準、發射器架構、RF濾波器設計、RF主動元件與模型、匹配與偏壓網路、低雜訊放大器與混波器、震盪器、頻率合成器與RF電源放大器設計等。
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Concepts in RF Design，Transmission Line Analysis，The Smith Chart，Modulation and Detection，Multiple Access Techniques and wireless Standards，Transceiver Architectures，An Overview of RF Filter Design，Active RF Components，Active RF component Modeling，Matching and Biasing Networks，Low-noise Amplifier and Mixers，Oscillators，Frequency Synthesizers，Power Amplifiers。

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

name.zh: 體驗行銷與產品設計實務

description.zh: 介紹體驗行銷之理論基礎及技巧以作為產品設計開發的策略，結合策略體驗模組及體驗媒介於產品設計之應用，以達創造出對顧客有價值的產品體驗之目標。
description.en: The fundamental theory and application skills of experiential marketing are to be introduced in this course as a product development strategy. The strategic experiential modules and the experiential media are applied in product design to create a valuable product experience for customers.

description.zh: 本課程探討運用物件導向技術開發軟體系統的過程與步驟，透過課程資訊系統專題製作，學習者將練習以UML分析與設計軟體系統，並使用一個物件導向語言(如Java或C++)實作之。課程內容: 1. 物件導向概念與模型語言 - UML介紹。2. 物件導向程式語言與環境介紹。3. 物件導向軟體開發生命週期，包括3.1物件導向需求分析 - 使用案例模型和活動圖，3.2物件導向設計 - 循序圖、類別圖、元件圖、部署圖、設計樣式，3.3 物件導向程式設計 - 設計與程式撰寫之應對。4. 專題製作。

Object-oriented languages and environments, 3. Term project.

description.zh: 流行家具設計專案包含家具流行趨勢研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。

Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive trend research.

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、IDEO公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。我

name.zh: 研究方法-應用語言學(一)

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉研究方法設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、個案研究法、人種誌研究法，行動研究法，觀察研究法和內容分析研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with the procedures of research in education and applied linguistics. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; case study; grounded theory research; ethnographic research; narrative research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.zh: 研究方法--文化研究應用(一)
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 「研究成果具有足以影響意見和行動的力量，因此有責任感的作者會以謹慎細心的態度撰寫之」。(MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv). 本課程以人文學科領域通用的MLA系統為基礎，加強學生對論文撰寫規範的認識，並經由研究過程的實踐和論文的撰寫體認學術研究的目的及價值。課程開始時學 生須選擇一較為廣泛的主題，學習如何抽絲剝繭，找出核心的問題，進一步釐清研究的重點所在，然後經過仔細研究搜尋，最後以論文報告呈現成果。透過此一過 程，學生將體認到學術研究有嚴謹明確的規範，需經過一步一步的印證，方能寫出合乎專業水準的研究論文或報告。
description.en: "Because research has the power to affect opinions and actions, responsible writers compose their work with great care." (MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv). This course will define for students the rules, practices, purposes, and value of scrupulous scholarship and careful documentation in accordance with the MLA system shared by a wide community of researchers world-wide. Beginning with the selection of a general topic, moving toward a specific research question and then researching and documenting the answer to that question will be a step-by-step process with clear guidelines resulting in the student's knowledge of how to produce a paper acceptable to scholars world-wide.

name.en: Children's Literature and English Language Teaching

description.zh: 本課程針對幼稚園、國小、與國中階段的英語師資而設計，在教材與教法的搭配上提供學理的引介與實務上的訓練。本課程設計考量這些階段學生之身心發展程度與興趣，將屬於兒童與青少年文學範疇的文本（例如：希臘神話、哈利波特系列、波西傑克森系列等等）作創意運用，幫助老師們擷取並改編合宜的教材，經由活潑的教學活動（包括：改編戲劇演出、繪本製作、歌唱舞蹈等等），提高學生的英語能力，也在培養他們體察文化差異的深層素養。
description.en: Designed for kindergarten, elementary school, and junior high school English teacher, this course aims to provide practical training and theories in teaching materials and pedagogy. Students of this course will also learn to adapt children and teenager literary works such as Greek mythology, the Harry Potter series, and the Posey Jackson series into materials suitable for students at the above-specified age groups. Possible learning activities such as role-play, picture books, dancing/singing will also be explored as methods to both develop students' English proficiency and cultural awareness.

description.zh: 口語言談或書寫篇章的整段言詞構成一個意義單位，表達某種溝通意義及意圖。用詞遣字最需要的是語言運用的條理性，包括上下文高度一致以及邏輯緊密連貫。此課程將利用道地英文文章為基礎來分析英文篇章詞句中的語意架構。這種實際操作的目標在於幫助學生發展英文寫作技巧，同時也訓練思考能力。此課程可能包括以下議題： 	英語/文的合理表達方式及結構 	母語的語言/概念基模對於外語言詞表達的影響 	字彙/言詞適當性與意識型態的關係 	英文中習慣與創新的言詞模式及字彙選擇 	構成英語文溝通模式的價值與信念系統 	外語社會文化語意貼切所需之認知精確度與概念流利度
description.en: Discourse as a stretch of spoken or written language constitutes a semantic unit to convey certain communicative meanings and intentions. It demands an orderly use of language in terms of a high level of lexical cohesion as well as logical coherence. This course will employ real-world English writing as a springboard to the analysis and understanding of semantic scaffolding of a discourse. Such a practice aims to help students develop skills in English writing along with those in critical thinking. Topics to be addressed may include the following: 	The sense-making expressions and structures in English;  	The impacts of L1 linguistic/conceptual schemas on the L2 discourse; 	The lexical/discursive appropriateness in relation to ideological complexes; 	The conventional and creative discursive patterns and lexical choices in English; 	The system of values and beliefs that constitutes the English-language communication mode;  	The cognitive sophistication and conceptual fluency

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。

This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

description.zh: 本課程希望讓學生了解如何正確選擇與使用多變項統計方法，並能閱讀、呈現與解釋多變項統計報告或結果。課程包括因子設計、實驗設計、共變數分析、複迴歸等主題，以探討教育研究中多重且同時的影響因素。
description.en: This curriculum lets students understand how to choose and use multi-variance statistics methods exactly.  It also includes that reading, presenting and explaining the report or result of multi-variance statistics analysis exactly.  The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

description.zh: 生質能源(bioenergy)指的是儲存在現有(活著或剛失去生命)的動植物體的能量。生質能源的來源，主要是植物將太陽能經由光合作用轉換成葡萄糖，在進一步合生物高分子衍生物(如多醣體(polysaccharides)) 。新一代生質能源技術強調環保技術，整合跨領域之技術，包含應用分子生物技術所發展出之基因轉殖、醱酵控制及生物觸媒技術-利用生物酵素進行催化化學反應達成環保及高效率與節能之目的。本課程將介紹動植物的多醣體種類及如何運用新興生物系統學的技術開發生質能源。
description.en: Bioenergy is referred to the energy stored in living or recently living biological organisms, such as animals, plants and microbes. The source of bioenergy can be traced back from plants harvesting the sunlight and converting it to glucose, then to other biopolymers such as polysaccharides. The technologies for developing bioenergy, with an emphasis on environmentally compatible, consist of gene cloning technology from molecular biology and enzymatic control and catalytic chemistry (i.e. green chemistry).  The course is an introduction course on the types of polysaccharides in animals and plants, how scientist use system biology to develop bioengergy.

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何將電化學技術應用於生物燃料電池上。生物燃料電池的觸媒主要是由酵素或是微生物甚至是生物細胞所組成，反應過程區分為電子直接轉移(mediatorless)與間接轉移(mediator)，並介紹此各種生物燃料電池的原理及應用，個別討論電池之反應過程、電池電極材料、電化學修飾電極及各種不同電池電解質溶液等個別元件。
description.en: The aim and purpose of this course is to introduce and expand the electrochemistry to develop the biofuel cells. Generally the catalysts of biofuel cell are composed by enzymes, microbial, creature cells and the bio-reduction process. In the biofuel cells the reaction process can be distinguished into mediator less and mediator transfer process. In this course, we will introduce the principle, reaction process and the application of biofuel cells. Especially, a detailed study about the utilization of film modified electrodes and different electrolyte solutions for the development of biofuel cells.

This course focuses on conducting an design research and presenting learners with a variety of research methods. Through the classes, this course aims to conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中演算法的原理、分析與設計策略，使學生了解各種演算法的設計，訓練如何分析解決實際的問題，以便學生可以設計有效率的電腦演算法程式，進而了解問題的難易，增加實作演算法能力。課程內容包括學習分析一個演算法的複雜度與界定一個問題難度的下界，並完整介紹整套NP-completeness計算理論。其中關於解決問題所使用的有效技巧，課程中將介紹一般常用的「貪婪法」、「各個擊破法」、「樹狀搜尋法」、「修剪與搜尋」、與「動態規劃法」及其它主題。同時課程中也將簡介演算法新的發展方向，包括「近似演算法」、「攤還分析」、「隨機演算法」、「線上演算法」等概念。最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，以了解近代演算法的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Mathematical background、Basic analysis techniques、Computational complexities、Worst case analysis and average case analysis、Basic Design Paradigms、Divide and conquer、Greedy methods、Dynamic programming、Probabilistic algorithms、Computational Complexity、Linear reduction of problems、NP-completeness。

description.zh: 1.有限場2.線性區塊碼3.迴旋碼4.格子編碼調變5.渦輪碼
description.en: 1.finite fields2.linear block codes3.convolutional codes4.trellis coded modulation5.turbo codes

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 中文內容概述: 本課程為大學部「電磁波」課程之延伸，強調無線通訊工程中常用之相關電磁波解析技巧，包括時間簡諧電磁場，物質的電性研究，高等電磁理論與原理、以及其他微波與毫米波新型技術
description.en: This course encompasses the most complete treatment on the electromagnetics for wireless communication engineering. It includes the physical and mathematical foundations of the theory of advanced electromagnetics, time-harmonic electromagnetic fields, electrical properties of matter, and other novel topics related to modern microwave and millimeter-wave technology.

description.zh: 專題討論照明設計與應用所涉及照明基本原理、視覺生心理與應用等課題，期能對於照明相關知識能有深刻了解，並能藉課堂的研討與文獻閱讀等方法提出深入之分析與見解。課程內容包括照度與均勻度專題、輝度專題、色溫度專題、演色性專題、燈具效率專題、照明與作業效率專題、照明與安全專題、室內眩光專題、戶外光汙染專題、光學性能量測專題、照明耗能評估專題、照明碳足跡專題、智慧照明專題等。
description.en: The topic is discussed with lighting, visual physiology, visual psychology and application that expect to understand some knowledge about lighting, by the method of discussion and technical literature reading to provide an opinion about lighting. The course are including illuminance topic, luminance topic, color temperature topic, color rendering topic, lighting efficiency topic, interior glare topic, outdoor light pollution topic, the measurement of lighting performance topic, the evaluation  of lighting energy topic, lighting carbon footprint topic, intelligent lighting topic.

description.zh: 本課程將探討互動科技運用於當代表演藝術之可能性與相關發展，並介紹互動表演形式與美學、電腦視覺與電腦聆聽、即時影像處理、即時音訊合成等，藉由實際展演計畫之提案與執行，透過跨領域合作，讓學生有機會將互動科技與表演藝術結合。「互動表演藝術 I 」將注重表演計畫之提案與發想、表演之腳本安排、舞台設計、聲音製作與成音系統設計等。
description.en: This course will explore the potential of incorporating interactive technology in performing arts and will also review the existing repertoire. In addition, topics about the form, the aesthetics of interactive performing arts, computer vision, computer listening, real-time video processing, and real-time audio synthesis will also be covered. Students will be asked to bring forth their proposal of interactive performing arts and to realize their work through formal presentation combining interactive technology and performing arts.  "Interactive Performing Arts I" will deal mainly with performance proposals, scenario planning, stage design, sound production and system design.

description.zh: 虛擬實境是一種藝術與科技的整合，廣泛運用在不同屬性的領域，如飛行模擬器、醫療檢測設備、成品預覽等。本虛擬實境應用之課程內容，將專注於虛擬實境應用對於未來科技、生活等不同層面的影響，同時探討沈浸、想像、互動與人類心理認知的相互關係。課程內容包含幾何式虛擬實境、影像式虛擬實境、混合式虛擬實境等。
description.en: Virtual reality (VR) is an integration of art and technology. It is widely used in fields that are very different in nature such as aviation simulator, medical inspection equipment, preview of finished products, etc. This course will focus on the impact of VR application in the future technology and lifestyles as well as explore the relationships among engrossment, imagination, interaction, and human psychological cognition. The course content includes graphic-based VR, imaged-based VR, and hybrid VR.

notes: 互動所與永續建築國際所合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋以下範圍：人類基因之組成、基因表達與疾病之關係、基因不穩定性與疾病之相關、家譜基因、遺傳基因特色、 癌症基因、與致病基因尋求方法介紹: 核酸雜交法、定序分析、聚合?鏈反應、體外基因誘變等.
description.en: Lectures are concerned with the following topics: Organization of the human genome, human gene expression, instability of the human genome, genes in pedigrees, genetic mapping of mendelian characters, molecular pathology, cancer genetics. The methods are used to search the possible disease-cause gene, will be introduced as following: physical and transcript mapping, nucleic acid hybridization assays, PCR, DNA sequencing and in vitro mutagenesis etc.

description.zh: 本課程將討論凝固組織之控制因子，平衡及非平衡狀態下金屬凝固現象，凝固界面之溶質分佈，單晶成長技術，凝固之過冷界面穩定理論，共晶型組織之成長，凝固之熱流分析，凝固之成核成長及粗性及均質處，理凝固理論之應用及鑄造工程簡介。
description.en: The subject area covers the following topics: Control variable of solidification structure and its application; Single crystal growths from the melt and solid; Heat flow in single crystal growth; Solute distribution in solidification, various cases will be treated in detail; Constitutional undercooling and interface stability; Solidification of castings and ingots; Lamellar eutectic growth; Nucleation growth and coarsening; Foundry engineering; Defects analysis in cast construction.

description.zh: 此課程包含幾大方向： 1.	醫工簡介 2.	常用之醫學材料 甲、	金屬 乙、	高分子 丙、	陶瓷 3.	奈米技術 4.	材料測試 甲、	物理/機械測試 乙、	細胞測試
description.en: The content of the lecture includes:1.Introduction to biomedical engineering2.commonly used medical materials: metals, polymers, ceramic3.nano-technology4.materials testing: physical/mechanical tests,iocompatibility tests

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

name.en: Space and Culture of Digital Buildings.

description.zh: 數位化的空間設計和社會、文化理論和機能間的探討和應用。
description.en: Application of theories of social and cultural function to considerations of spatial layout and design of a particular building type.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 本課程是針對自然界因地質作用所引發的地質災害進行研究，尤其著重於各種地質災害的調查與分析。根據衛星影像與航照判釋、現場地質勘查與分析以及各種潛在危險災害發生率與影響性評估方法，對各種地質災害類型依發生頻率及潛在危險性，討論在區域開發上之限制與事前的整治防範。同時也分析各個地質災害案例，了解人與自然環境的互動關係。
description.en: In the past ten years, There have always been natural earth processes that are hazardous to people of Taiwan. Natural disasters such as typhoon, earthquakes, river flooding hazards, landslides, debris flow hazards and subsidences caused loss of life or property damage. These disasters made people realize that the natural processes that produce natural disasters must be recognized. They must be avoided where possible, and their threat to human life and property must be minimized.In fact, natural hazards are nothing more than natural processes. They become hazards only when people live or work in areas where these processes occur naturally. The purpose of this course is hoped to serve some methods to identify and analysis potentially hazardous processes. It is also provided some concepts and training to formulate various alternatives to avoid or minimize the threat to human life or property.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程教授數值分析之基本理論，使學生能夠(1)撰寫運算程式(2)應用數值方法求解各類型數學問題內容包括誤差分析、非線性方程式求解（二分法、牛頓法、截線法）、泰勒展開式與Lagrange內差法、高斯消去與LU分解法、非線性系統求解、曲線擬合與富利葉逼近、數值微分與積分、微分方程式求解、最佳化問題求解等
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce basic methods of numerical analysis and to provide the groundwork for the research in the Institute of Industrial Engineering and Management. The objectives guide students to: (1) Write simple program for numerical calculations. (2) Find approximate solutions of various mathematical problems. Course content includes error analysis, solving a nonlinear equation (e.g. bracketing methods for locating a root, Newton-Raphson and secant methods), Taylor series and Lagrange approximation, Gaussian elimination, LU decomposition, Solving nonlinear system, Curve Fitting, Interpolation by spline function, Fourier series and expansion, numerical differentiation & integration, solving differential equations, Minimization of a function, etc.

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解認知人因工程理論與研究方法，並使學生能應用這些理論與研究方法來探討與解決實際問題，提升整體系統之績效。
description.en: The purpose of the course is for students to learn about theories and research methods of cognitive human factors, and to learn how to apply these theories and methods for investigating and solving practical problems, and improving overall system performance.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metals and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 於品質要求提升之情況下，自動化檢測系統成為現行產業界重要開發之工具之一，故本課程之目的在教授開法PC-based自動化檢測系統之基本知識與技能，主要在培養未來自動化檢測之開發技術人員。課程內容包括：3D CAD 繪圖設計、BCB程式介面之開發與設計、PC-based自動化控制、光學檢測之技術、e-Vision之使用、OpenCV之程式設計、基礎資料庫之應用、品質管制圖之原理及使用、及其他檢測相關技術等。
description.en: Quality has been one of the most important issues in currently manufacturing industry such that automated inspection system becomes a crucial tool.  Therefore, the objective of this course is to offer the basic knowledge and skill in developing a PC-based automated inspection system.  The content of this course includes: 3D CAD design, programming design using Borland C++ Builder, PC-based motion and I/O control, inspection design with e-Vision, basic programming design using OpenCV, database design, quality control chart, and related knowledge about inspection tools.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於按照熱力學和原子機構的基本理論來解釋一些新發展，並以此來討論相變化的問題。內容有相變化之熱力學和擴散學理論，液相－固相及固相－固相相變化之討論。
description.en: The objective of this course to present a treatment of phase transformations in which these and other new developments could be explained in terms of the basic principles of thermodynamics and atomic mechanisms。The contents introduce thermodynamics and diffusion theories of phase transformations，and deal with liquid－solid phase transformations，solid－solid phase transformations。

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 面對全球化製造，供應鏈，與運籌管理的日漸普及各行業，如何e化企業是台灣企業界高階決策主管們的當急之務。本課程介紹目前e化管理的企業環境;教導與e化管理在策略，營運，行銷，財務四方面相關議題的理論基礎和管理實務上的應用;訓練學生將e化的觀念和思維融入現有的管理體系，使企業能掌握其產業鏈之最大價值，以創新的e化管理模式，整合企業本身資源，協調上下游廠商的供銷機能，使企業能朝e化與全球化運籌管理邁進，?到永續經營的目的。
description.en: Facing to the globalization of production, supply chain and logistics management of different business types and industries, it is important for top managers to utilize electronic business management. This course introduces current business environment of e-commerce and aims at four main e-business management issues, i.e., strategic, operations, marketing and finance. This course will also train students to corporate electronic management concepts and thinking into current management system, to integrate corporate resources, to coordinate upstream and downstream business partners, and to help business electronic management and globalization logistics management.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統軟體設計實務

description.zh: 本課程將提供系上學生兼具實務與理論之課程特色及專業實務訓練，以強化本系學生對於嵌入式系統軟硬體技術的認識與實作能力，其內容包括： （１）嵌入式系統開發環境建置 （２）嵌入式作業系統與各種自由軟體授權模式簡介 （３） UML於嵌入式軟體工程應用與CMMI標準（４）開放源碼之圖形化介面函式庫與視覺處理函示庫（５）智慧型手持行動裝置 （6）異質多核心平台之開發
description.en: The objective of this course is to familiarize the student with design methodologies, tools, and implementation practices of embedded software design. Its topics include: 1. Embedded System Development Platform and Tool-chains. 2. Embedded Operating Systems and Open Source Software Engineering.  3. UML for Embedded Software Engineering and CMMI. 4. Developing Embedded Software Using Opensource GUI and Computer Vision Libraries. 5. Embedded Mobile Devices. 6. Heterogeneous Multi-core Embedded Platforms.

description.zh: (1)資料庫系統簡介，(2)關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3)資料表正規化，(4)結構化查詢語言，(5)交易管理與並時控制(6)分散式資料庫管理系統(7)物件導向式資料庫(8)電子商務中之資料庫(9)資料庫管理(10)網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 老人醫學基礎、 老人藥物學概論、 老人預防醫學概論、 老人醫療倫理與醫療效益概論、 老人永續照護概論 、老人感染與傳染病防治概論、老人精神照護概論、老人一般醫學概論、 老人急重症醫學概論、 老人醫療與生活科技技術概論
description.en: 1. General principle of aging  2. Geriatric pharmacy  3. Preventive geriatrics  4. Ethics and medical effects in geriatrics  5. Perpetual geriatric care  6. Infections management and prevention in elderly  7. Psychogeriatric care  8. General geriatrics 9. Geriatric emergency medical care 10. LOHAS (Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability) technology,

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

description.zh: 簡介、數位影像處理的基礎、影像的轉換、影像的增強、影像的復原、影像的壓縮、影像分割、影像的表達及描述、自動車導航及醫學影像的處理和應用、論文討論。
description.en: Introduction, Window operation System, API, DDL, Design of DDE and OLE, Structure of Client/Server System, Multimedia, Image Compression, Graphic supervisory/control system.

description.zh: 本課程分三單元，包括：(1) 應用量子力學：量子力學的基本結構，簡單量子系統，原子、分子及晶體之電子結構與能階，量子躍遷，量子統計，傳輸現象、量子雜訊，晶體能帶結構，量子光學，多體量子系統。(2)奈米材料學：奈米材料之基本性質，奈米材料特殊之物性，奈米材料擴散及燒結特性，特殊奈米材料、CNT製程與應用。(3)奈米顆粒材料：奈米顆粒材料特性，奈米顆粒材料之製程，奈米顆粒材料之檢測分析技術，奈米顆粒材料之光電應用，奈米顆粒材料之熱流應用，奈米顆粒材料之生化應用，奈米顆粒材料專題報告。
description.en: (1) Applied quantum mechanics: Basic approach, simple quantum systems, time dependent quantum phenomena, statistical physics, transport phenomena, quantum  optics,  many-body effects.(2) Nano materials: Fundamental properties of material special physical properties diffusion and sintering characteristics, carbon nano tube related fabrication process and application.(3) Nanoparticles Technology: Property of nano particles fabrication, measuring analysis, some applications related with optoelectronics fluid, thermal, and biochemistry project.

name.en: The Study of Design Business Management(I)

description.zh: 設計事業管理的重要性與複雜性並不低於一般事業機構，但多數設計事業經營者並未受過正規事業管理訓練，因而或遭遇經營上的困難，或無法在事業經營領域有長足的表現。設計事業管理研究（一）重點可分為：1. 設計事業本質之探討； 2. 設計溝通；3. 設計市場學。透過良好的事業管理，設計業者可望為客戶提供更好的產品與服務；創造更好的利潤並有助於整體設計事業界之提升。
description.en: The management of design business is no less important and complex than any business but most designers or design practitioners seemed unfamiliar with this field; therefore, might have experienced difficulties while running the design firm. This study involves exploring: 1. the essence of the design profession; 2. effective design communication; 3. design marketing. Excellent performance of design business management leads to good design products/services; it leads also better profit to the design practitioner and the overall benefit to the design profession.

name.zh: 公共戶外家具設計研究

description.zh: 藉由戶外家具案例之分析探討公共環境與人類行為間之關係及公共戶外家具之材料、造形、人機介面、維護與安全等因素，並經由討論形成公共戶外家具之設計思維。
description.en: Case studies on outdoors furniture design to examine the relationship between open space environment and human behavior. The design factors of material, form, ergonomics, maintenance and safety will be studied. Design philosophy of outdoors furniture is to be deliberating in the discussions.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高等應用統計的相關原理方法與應用案例，包括一般資料分析、迴歸分析、時間序列分析、類別資料分析、樞紐分析、抽樣調查等。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: This course is mainly to learn some advanced methods of statistics and their application in business. The topics include general data analysis, regression, time series analysis, category data analysis, pivot analysis and sampling investment. The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in applied statistics practice.

description.zh: 在《電影》(一九二六) 一文裡，維吉尼亞o吳爾芙曾說：文學作品與其改編電影的關係，就如不幸的受害者與貪婪的掠奪者或寄生蟲之間的關係一般。電影業已經建立了一項傳統，將文學作品作為滋養其文化與美學內涵的材料來源。然而，對吳爾芙而言，這種傳統卻為電影業與文學作品帶來了災難性的結果。如她所言：「正當眼睛與大腦欲攜手合作卻徒勞無功之際，他們同時亦遭受到無情地剝離。」儘管吳爾芙也許對於文學作品與其改編電影的關係過於悲觀，然而，她的話有時聽來卻也千真萬確。在本課程裡，我們將探討改編自文學作品的電影之局限和缺點，以及其潛力和長處等問題。我們將研究，在文學作品之中得依賴讀者想像力才能生動傳達的微妙心理，電影裡的聲音與視覺效果須如何將之傳遞?文學與電影在處理象徵及思想的方法上，有何不同?還有，改編自文學作品的電影如何偏離文學原作之主題或結構，以便迎合當代觀眾之美學、心理、社會、政治、以及文化等層面的期待？本課程將研究之文學作品與改編電影將於下列作品中選出，但是不局限於下列作品：Joseph Conrad, Heart of Darkness (1899)Francis Ford Coppola, Apocalypse Now (1979)Rudyard Kipling, Kim (1901)John Howard Davie
description.en: In "The Cinema" (1926), Virginia Woolf observes that the relationship between works of literature and their film adaptations is like that between unfortunate victims and their rapacious predators or parasites. The cinema has established a tradition of feeding on works of literature as a source of cultural and aesthetic nourishment. But the results for her are "disastrous to both." As she puts it, "Eye and brain are torn asunder ruthlessly as they try vainly to work in couples." Although Woolf might have been over pessimistic about the alliance between works of literature and film adaptations, yet her words ring true at times. In this course, we will explore the limitations and shortcomings as well as the potentialities and strengths of the film adaptations of literary works. We will examine how cinematic sound and visual effects convey psychological subtleties, whose rendition in literature relies heavily on words that come alive only in our imagination; how symbols and thoughts are tr

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，國家特制定著作權法；本課程重心在於介紹我國著作權法之內涵，包含該法所保護之「著作」範圍、權利人及著作權範圍、著作權管理及權利侵害之救濟等，除講授理論外，同時搭配案例解析，以期讓同學對著作權法有最完整之了解。
description.en: Copyright Act is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. This course introduces the main meanings, concepts and contents of the Copyright Law. Including the scope for copyright protection, the kinds of works that qualify for copyright protection, the rights granted to copyright owners, the management of copyright, and remedies for right infringement. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下：1.專利權利項解讀2.專利侵權分析流程3.專利迴避設計要件4.專利策略分析5.專利佈局實務6.案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around.  In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies.  However, in practice, they perform much less.  That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty.  This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies.  The outline of this course is given as follows:Patent claim interpretation;Process of patent infringement analysis;Requirements of patent design around;Patent strategy analysis;Practice on patent strategies; andStudy on patent cases.

description.zh: 1.MOS元件工作模式及MOSFET原理 2.微小MOSFET的額外考慮 3.矽晶圓的生長 4.擴 散 5.離子植入 6.氧化處理 7.CVD技術 8.微影術 9.蒸鍍與濺鍍 10.光罩製作 11.CMOS IC製程

The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: (1)簡述行動無線通訊，(2)無線網際網路與WLAN，(3)行動隨意式網路（MANET），(4)MANET：MAC層協約，(5)MANET：多重路由協約，(6)MANET：服務品質，(7)MANET：安全協約，(8)MANET：電能管哩，(9)無線感測網路，(10)混合式無線網路，(11)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1)Introduction to Mobile Wireless Communications,(2)Wireless Internet and LANs,(3)Mobile Ad Hoc Wireless Networks (MANET),(4)MAC Protocols for MANET,(5)Multiple Routing in MANET,(6)QoS in MANET,(7)Security Protocols for MANET,(8)Energy Management in MANET,(9)Wireless Sensor Networks,(10)Hybrid Wireless Networks(11)	Recent Advances and Research Issues.

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。
description.en: The primary object of this course is to present the fundamental concept and treatment for spatial signal processing dealing with interference encountered in wirelwss communication by using an adaptive array. It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 中文內容概述: 本課程為大學部「電磁波」課程之延伸，強調無線通訊工程中常用之相關電磁波解析技巧，包括時間簡諧電磁場，物質的電性研究，高等電磁理論與原理、以及其他微波與毫米波新型技術
description.en: This course encompasses the most complete treatment on the electromagnetics for wireless communication engineering. It includes the physical and mathematical foundations of the theory of advanced electromagnetics, time-harmonic electromagnetic fields, electrical properties of matter, and other novel topics related to modern microwave and millimeter-wave technology.

description.en: 1.Ideal Transmission line Fundamentals2.Crosstalk3.Nonideal Interconnect Issues4.Connectors, Packages, and Vias5.Nonideal Return Paths, Simultaneous Switching Noise and Power Delivery6.Electronic Circuits Simulations
