description.en: advanced engineering geology , sampling and physical method, application of                                          instrument and test like pressurement , vane shear instrument , dilationter . in-situ                                          permeability test, direct shear instrument, foundation loads test, rock direct shear                                          test, rock cleft, pressure meter, steel bar instrument , piezometer, soil pressurement

description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

name.en: Special topics in mineral resources engineering 2

description.zh: 為增強學生對於學術論文的研究能量，本課程針對本所研究生對於資源處理與材料製程個別研究領域做更深層之學術與工業應用專業養成。內容包含各指導教授專業領域進階鑽研、研究室未來發展研究領域之開創與新研究團隊共同學術探討....等等。選課事項: 必須針對研究生個別之研究方向經指導教授同意選擇適當之課程。
description.en: In order to investigate of an advanced nature leading to the preparation of a thesis or dissertation, this course deals with the theory and industrial practice of mineral resources engineering. It covers the specific research and development topics in raw materials and mineral resources reutilization.Prerequisite: Permission of advisor, based on adequate background in relative reseach field.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 本門課主要簡介各項再生能源系統之原理與未來發展，內容包括以下﹕各種再生能源系統之應用與分析，燃料電池之應用與分析，生質能之應用，及新能源之應用效益分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and future development of renewable system that includes the applications and analysis of different types of renewable energy, fuel cells, and bio-energy, analysis on the benefits of new energy applications.

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性的相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。
description.en: The topics of this course include interactivity, and virtual experience, virtual community, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

notes: 適用99學年度入學碩士生/碩二班

description.zh: 流體動力與化學動力學，Rankine-Hugoniot 關係，擴散火燄與液滴燃燒，層流火燄，紊流火燄，引燃、焠熄、可燃極限，噴霧燃燒
description.en: Fluid Dynamics and Chemical Kinetics, Rankine-Hugoniot relations, Diffusion flames and Droplet Burning, Laminar Flames, Turbulent Flames, Ignition, Quenching and Flammability Limits, Spray Combustion.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

name.zh: 進階家具與室內設計(一)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Furniture and Interior Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills.  Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

name.zh: 創業講座-北科校友‧標竿企業

description.zh: 本課程邀請歷屆傑出校友分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: This course will invite excellent graduates of NTUT to share their successful experiences of starting a new enterprise. The main purpose of this course is to let students have the chance for learning the entrepreneurship by the real successful experiences of the graduates. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 四管二與經管所合開,三ABC上課,限300人

name.zh: 國際觀培養-北科校友‧放眼世界
name.en: Developing Global Perspectives - Going beyond the Campus from Experiences of NTUT Alumni

description.zh: 本課程邀請歷屆傑出校友分享其國際實務經驗，進而激發同學追求國際化的渴望，強化學生對人生願景的規劃，使其在國際交流活動上有更為積極的作用。
description.en: This course invites a number of outstanding alumni to share their experiences and thoughts on developing global perspectives and to instill in students the meaning a global citizen in today's world. The goal is to inspire students to engage in international activities and, ultimately, to plan a future with an international mindset.

notes: 四管二與經管所合開,二ABC上課,限300人

name.en: A Briefing on Architecture Design Course (I)

description.zh: 總課程目標： 在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非 實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研一課程目標： 了解理論與實踐之理性關係，其對象應包含自實質至非實質環 境。 課程概要： 利用不同設計課題就學員原有專長實際操作其自理論至實踐之 因果關係。此階段較偏向對目標之了解，就各學員所選定課題 完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程書面資料，以接受目 標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course : Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. 1st GradeThrough manipulation of different design topics, the disciples learn to understand the relational relationship between theory and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete presentation which includes design result and a report of the process of the ascertainment will be required for evaluation.

name.zh: 都市與建築的歷史性分析
name.en: Analysis on Historicity of Cities and Architecture

description.zh: 每個城市有其生長的脈絡與痕跡，即使歷史的命運與文化的特質使得某些城市有近似的發展面貌，但是就如同人類一般，沒有城市的面貌是相同的。本課程將從聚落或是城市發展的歷程，閱讀城市空間的特質。學習從城市的地理環境、街道與街廓的形態，以及從不同年代的建築類型、立面形式、甚至構造材料等等，亦即從都市紋理的演變，進行一座城市的歷史解讀。無論是經過計畫、呈現幾何性很強的城市，或是經由自然成長、具有有機發展痕跡的城市，均為本課程所探討的對象。而一座具有歷史的建築的生命歷程，亦會與城市一般，有其不同階段的生命歷程。這個建築的生命歷程，則反映在建築的各個元素與部位上。建築體的歷史，則更細膩地表現在建築的細部上，由空間形式、建築構成、結構、材料、構件組合方式、裝飾、裝飾匠師匠藝等等，藉由上述內容解讀建築的生命歷程，從而建立建築的生命年表，而可用於建築物歷史與價值的判定。上述的城市抑或是建築的共時性或歷時性的歷史性分析，均從類型學與形態學著手，建立一套歷史系譜。
description.en: Every city has its own historic context and traces, even though the historical fate and cultural characteristic shape some similar aspects of some cities. But, just like the look of human being, people look alike, but no one looks the same (except for twins). It doesn’t exist two identical cities. We would like to observe how a settlement or a city develops from its origin, and to read the characteristic of its space. We also try to learn to understand a city from its geographical environment, forms of streets and blocks, architectural types of diverse ages, styles of facades and even the constructive materials, etc., that is, from the development of its urban fabrics, to decode its spaces. No matter if those cities were planned with strong geometrical character, or expanded gradually with organic forms, we would study them in this seminar.Just as what we just describe on a city, one building or a group of buildings has their life history to be browsed. Different from a city, the

description.zh: 台灣傳統建築史的研究已歷多年發展，累積了相當豐富的研究成果。本課程擬由傳統閩客建築類型所屬之空間文化進行研討，透過"環境與構造"、"儀式與空間"、"政治與建築"等進階專題研討，期待引領修課同學進入並體驗台灣傳統建築的深層特色與意涵，過程中除了相關文獻的閱讀，案例調查報告外，並由田野實地參觀，帶領同學感受台灣傳統閩客建築的獨特環境與空間文化。
description.en: The research of the history of Taiwanese traditional architecture has got a great achievement after many years of development. This course is focus on the spatial culture of different types of traditional Hakka and Fujian architecture. I hopes that every students could understand and experience the deep social cultural meanings and features through the study of following three issues :"environment and construction", "rite and space" and "politics and architecture".  This course would not only be proceeded by the reading of related documents and the reporting of different case, it also combined the field visiting and investment to lead students to enjoy the very special cultural heritage.

name.zh: 創新講座-北科校友．創新與管理

description.zh: 本課程係提供全校學生與實務界交流的平台，提供學生建立創新發展與管理的理論與實務經驗，透過邀請本校傑出校友進行專題講座，返校分享其企業創新與管理之經驗，以作為學生未來創業與創新工作之參考。
description.en: This program provides a platform for whole school students to interact with the enterprises and practitioners and helps students to establish theories and practical experiences of innovative developments and managements. For the whole school students, this program can be a reference for future work by inviting distinguished alumni to address lectures to share innovative and management experiences of the enterprises.

notes: 四設四、創新所與最後一哩合開,研究所限28人,周一ABC

description.zh: 此課程主要目標在學習VLSI系統架構設計，使學生以宏觀的系統架構觀念設計超大型積體電路。其課程內容包含如下： 1、VLSI架構設計原理 2、各式積體電路架構介紹 3、運算處理單元架構設計 4、多媒體架構實例 5、高速及高效能的數位積體電路架夠 6、專題研究
description.en: 1. Basic Design Skills2. Introduction to digital signal processing systems3. Iteration bound4. Pipeline and parallel processing5. Retiming6. Unfolding7. Folding8. Systolic array architecture9. Scheduling and resource allocation10. Processing element design11. Programmable digital signal processors

description.zh: 本課程再使學生瞭解灰色系統的理論及原理，進而培養學生能運用該灰色系統之理論於資訊系統，控制系統，影像處理，糢糊控制，類神經網路，醫學，工業，經濟及管理等領域之應用：課程內容包含：1.灰色系統介紹 2.灰色關聯度分析 3.灰色預測原理4.灰色建模 5.灰色系統的應用 6.實例學習
description.en: This course is introduced the principle and theory of grey ststem. Therefore, the student can be used the grey systemapplied to information sytem, control system, image processing,fuzzy control, neural network, medicine, industry,economy,and manaement,etc..The contents of this course is:1.The introduction of grey system 2.Grey relational analysis 3.the theory of grey prediction 4.the grey modeling 5.The application of grey system 6.Case study

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

description.zh: 設計專業用進階德文；設計專業德文導讀及加強德文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，概念理解及溝通設計用之德文。
description.en: The alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of advanced German to building the capability of reading, speaking, writing and understanding the design advanced German.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

name.zh: 就業達人講座-卓越校友職場聖經

description.zh: 適逢建校百週年，本課程邀請卓越校友回母校與同學交流，以最貼近學生觀點之角度切入議題，協助學生在面臨就業之際能事前做好身心靈準備。本學期蒞校之卓越校友分別來自六個學院不同領域，除了帶來最新產業趨勢及業界人才需求等資訊，更以學長姐身份分享多年職場經驗及成功策略，並指導同學如何運用北科大之資源為自己加值，傳承為北科大量身訂做的就業聖經，以強化學生職場力與人生定位之觀念，進而提升本校學生之就業戰力。
description.en: "This course invites a number of outstanding alumni, including six different collage fields, to share their experiences about employment issues from students’ viewpoint and to inspire them for the coming challenges. These alumni will address the newest industrial trend and information about the required manpower; moreover, by establishing these professional information and successful job strategies, students can strengthen the abilities of knowing when to act and what action to take in companies. Gradually, they are willing, with enthusiastic minds, to make efforts on their job. Therefore, these alumni experiences will benefit students on their competition towards the future."

notes: 四電四甲、電機所與最後一哩合開,限200人,三ABC上課

description.zh: 本課程基於資料管理的複雜性與實務需求，介紹雲端資訊管理需求的儲存技術基礎架構與相關技術，使學生對雲端儲存與管理有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統的架構基礎 2. 儲存網路技術和虛擬化技術 3. 業務持續運作儲存技術 4. 儲存架構安全與管理 5. 雲端排程技術 6. 雲端效能與安全測試 7. 期末專題設計
description.en: This course covers the technical foundations of cloud information storage management as well as the practice of storage management through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage System 2. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization 3. Business Continuity 4. Storage Security and Management 5. Cloud Scheduling 6. Cloud Performance and Security Testing 7. Final Project.

description.zh: 跨文化溝通, 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved intercultural communication and design project with research and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive research. The study of related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 本課程在透過研討，讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

name.en: Doctoral Seminar in Management and Models

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解管理專題與模式之基本專題研究與模式設計，明瞭研究管理專題與模式應用的關係，知道並熟悉管理專題的研究工具，討論管理專題的研究發展趨勢。而授課主題包括管理專題研究與管理模式設計等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to discuss research issues and major models in management. It is to introduce students the models design and research skills of management in the class. Through model design, students will develop research skills in making the issue of management. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations. The topics have many research issues and models design skills of management

name.zh: 第二語言習得專題討論

description.zh: 本課程將對第二語言習得的主要議題進行深入地探討論與分析。上課的內容包括，但不限於，下列主題: 語言天賦、跨語言影響、人格特質、學習動機、學習風格、學習策略、外語焦慮和外語學習信念等。
description.en: This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of selected issues and problems in second language acquisition. The topics covered in this course include, but are not limited to, the following: language aptitude, cross-linguistic influences, personality, motivation, leaning styles, learning strategies, language anxiety, and learners' beliefs.

description.zh: 為保障商標權及消費者利益，維護市場公平競爭，促進工商企業正常發展，國家特制定商標法，本課程以介紹我國商標法為重點，主要內容包括商標規範之基本原理、商標之構成要素、商標之分類方式及各類型商標之特性與功能、申請商標註冊之程序、商標註冊之審查及核准、商標權之取得及行使、異議程序及紛爭處理、權利侵害之救濟等。
description.en: Trademark Act is formulated to safeguard trademark rights and the consumers' interest, maintain fair competition of markets, and facilitate normal development of industries and commerce. This course is focusing on the introduction of Trademark Act. Topics will mainly include the basic principle of trademark standard, the integrant part of trademark, the characteristic and the function of trademark, the application procedures, examination and approval, acquisition of the trademark rights and exercises, the procedure of opposition and the dispute processes, remedies for right infringement and so on.

description.zh: 針對大學所習之廣義生產管理再作深入的闡述，一方面做公開的個案分析研討，以收進一步的學習之效，同時要求學生做實務專題研究
description.en: Production and operation management,case study and analysis,and independent study.

notes: 管理國際專班為必修；工管所為選修

name.en: Clinical Application of Medical Electronic Device

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為使學生以電子學的知識，應用在生物醫學的臨床領域。本課程將介紹生理測量的應用電路，由電路的實現使學生更能感受到生醫電子的實際應用範疇。包含生醫感測器、生醫電子放大器、血壓和心血管診斷儀器。本課程主要著重在觀念的溝通與臨床之應用，使學生能學習與扮演電子工程與臨床醫學之橋樑角色。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with electronics knowledge, to help the clinical application in the biomedical field. This course will introduce the medical electronic systems and electronic circuit theory, and then introduce the application of physiological measurement circuit. Mainly on medical equipment and application of technical principles, which includes  biomedical sensors, electrodes and transducers, biomedical electronic amplifier, blood pressure and cardiovascular diagnostic equipment. The students can learn and play a role of bridge between electrical engineering and clinical medicine.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：一、研究的特性 二、智慧收集-「什麼」的問題 三、研究-「何故」的問題 四、良好研究的特質 五、研究的基本類型 六、從事研究的技能 七、 研究倫理 八、研究設計練習。
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Characteristics of research 2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions 3. Research-the "why" questions 4. Characteristics of good research 5. Basic types of research 6. The craft of doing research 7. Research ethics 8. Research design practice.

description.zh: 本課程為工程技術組必修，分為綠建築、建築構法、數位媒體、建築生產、建築在利用、環境控制等專題，每學期視任課老師專長輪流開設兩至三個專題，採用分組方式個別指導，每位學生必須修習兩個不同專題。本課程將針對建築實務中所面對之技術課題進行個案研究並模擬操作其設計至細部設計階段。
description.en: This is a design studio class, focused on the technical side for topics as Green Building, Building Systems, Digital Design Media, Building Production, Building Reuse, Environment Control, and others were be included. There will have only two or three topics in each semester, depends on the teacher's specialty, and each student needs take two topics in one year.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1.以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；2.探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；3.探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；4.學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；5.具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.Contents：1. The indoor environment of different types of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.

name.en: Regional Methodology on Landscape and Architecture

description.zh: 本課程以地域論述為中心講述有關知識體系的基礎和架構。第一部份涵蓋人文主義地理學、文化地景、以及存在主義及其支系的現象學等基礎；第二部份講授以上述知識論為主的地景和建築詮釋與實踐，包括城市規劃、建築和地景建築理論等範疇的相應，介紹地域論者如Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton等人的觀點。第三部分為以台灣地區地域地景與建築思維的議題導向，進一步充實地域文化的空間-形式的智性思維。
description.en: This course is underpinned upon the epistemology of Regionalism that consisted of three parts. The first part traces back to Humanistic Geography, Cultural Landscape, Existentialism and its philosophical branch line-phenomenology, which are sources of the Regionalism. The second part is centered on interpretation and implementation in either landscape or architecture disciplines, in relation to the perspectives of city planning, architecture, and landscape architecture. And Regionalist advocates like Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton and so on are included. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural Space-From topics are introduced to substantiate intellectual understandings.

description.zh: 課程包含三大領域之說明：「智慧化概念」以設計智慧化環境為始，探討感知及未來性空間設計之互動關係為基礎；「智慧材料與技術」說明空間與技術模組之衍伸歷程，從智慧牆之功能性探討到三維技術性在建築應用之各類挑戰成果；「智慧設計與應用」探討誘導式住宅之介面與自然學習的智慧演化關係，配合案例介紹探討未來性之空間設計應用。
description.en: The Intelligent Housing, Intelligent Material & Technology and Intelligent design & Application are the major focus. Points in this course,"Intelligent Housing" concentrate on the interaction between cognition & future spatial design. "Intelligent Material & Technology"focus on functional window as well as 3-D technical applications; "Intelligent design applications"explore the interface of Introductive Housing and natural Intelligent learning. For some case study and design development.

description.zh: 奈微米工程於生物醫學之應用日趨重要，量測與操作工具的開發與實際的生醫應用對象的大小尺寸具有密切的相關性，對於生物系統的充份瞭解是工程表現的重要過程之一。在此課程中將配合本校實驗室目前之相關研究設備進行原理講解與應用討論，包括之項目將由分子、細胞到組織之感測、分析與操縱。選修學生須依下列重點：奈微米生醫感測系統、奈米生醫材料、奈米生醫光電以及實驗室晶片等領域選擇期中期末報告之題目與計畫內容，主要要求在尋求創新思考方向，以求在原理或應用上的突破，積極推動跨領域與技術先進之整合性研究。
description.en: Nano/micro engineering in bio-medicine applications has become increasingly important. The development and operation of measurement tool for biomedical applications has a close correlation to the actual size of the object. In this course we will explain the principles of devices and discuss the applications based on the school's research laboratories, including sensing, analysis and manipulation of molecules, cells, and tissues. Students will be required to do a project about Nano-micron biomedical sensor systems, nano-biomaterials and nano-biomedical areas such as optical and lab-chip. The interim and final report should devote to the topic and plans in the search for the direction of Creative Thinking with a view to the breakthrough of theory or application, and actively promote the integration of advanced interdisciplinary research and technology.

description.zh: 機構與機械元件設計基礎，古典動力學基礎，近代機械加工，電機機械，電機驅動與設計，光電及感測基本原理，光檢測，雷射光在量測上的應用技術，機電系統匹配，專題實作及實驗等機電相關課題。
description.en: Mechanisms and machine elements, classical dynamics, modern machining methods, electric machines and drivers, sensors, optical testing, concepts and methods of precision measurements with laser, mechatronic integration, special topics and labs of mechatronic system.

notes: 與雷射光機電專班合開

description.zh: 本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點：1.	建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。2.	學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。3.	以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。4.	以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to help students (1) sharpen up their learning skills in English language/culture acquisition, (2) prepare a personal dossier (including autobiography, resume, CV and application letters) in English for their future career needs, (3) build up their communication skills through classroom activities, such as singing, reciting passages, short plays, small talks, and speeches.

notes: 限電機及工管系碩博士學生選修
